entry.title: Grow Log - 2/6/13
entry.content:
I have since removed all my plants except the two peppers. The herbs and collards were past their prime and the eggplant never set fruit. I did have luck in getting one of the the pepper plants to set fruit by using a small paintbrush to pollenate the flowers. The second plant was pruned back.

http://i.imgur.com/iBF56WY.jpg" title="‘Pepper plant’" > http://i.imgur.com/ilYQNB0.jpg" title="‘Close up’" >

entry.title: Grow Log - 10/22/13
entry.content: Today I changed the light cycle over to 12/12. The eggplant is starting to grow flowers so I’m hoping this will induce fruiting.

entry.title: grow log - 9/22/13
entry.content: Changed the water today. Mixed the new solution to full strength.

entry.title: Grow Log - 9/12/13
entry.content:
The garden has been moved to a new spot and I picked up a new reservoir that holds ten more gallons and is much more sturdy.

http://i.imgur.com/fVQP7JA.jpg">

I topped the basil plant so it would start growing out instead of just up. You can see how this made the plant split, and once it grows out a bit more, I’ll top each of the two main stems in order to make it branch out again.

http://i.imgur.com/wa0zGJ7.jpg">

The cucumber plant is starting to grow flowers!

http://i.imgur.com/VkMSMnH.jpg"> http://i.imgur.com/WGQ1BUV.jpg">

While this mystery plant has been growing extremely slowly compared to the others, it has been making some noticible progress lately.

http://i.imgur.com/xdNFRAl.jpg">

The two pepper plants are doing great. It’s really obvious that they are doing much better than they would have under the old lighting system.

http://i.imgur.com/xN7FdN0.jpg">
